documents.document: @fabricofmylife @angloyankophile @_kristybarber It's ludicrous! People outside of the creative industries don't get asked that question, should why should our work be worth any less?
@fabricofmylife @angloyankophile @_kristybarber I'm with your there. As a copywriter, I have lost count of the number of times I've been asked to do something for free for 'exposure'.
@ItalyAlexandra ðŸ˜³
@angloyankophile @fabricofmylife @_kristybarber Couldn't agree more! There's no acknowledgement of the time, effort and planning that goes into creating unique content.
@angloyankophile @fabricofmylife @_kristybarber YES! Because a back link is going to pay the mortgage. I think not ðŸ¤¦ðŸ»â€â™€ï¸
